mapper.select:
SELECT mpwo.work_order_id,-- 工单ID mpwo.org_id,-- 组织 mpwo.work_order_code,-- 离散单号 oso.sales_order_code, -- 生产单号 bm.material_code,-- 制造编码 bm.material_name,-- 产品描述 mswob.barcode,-- 厂内码 makpr.part_barcode AS sale_barcode,-- 销售码 mswob.create_time AS work_create_time,-- 厂内码生成时间 mswobsale.create_time AS sale_create_time,-- 销售码生成时间 mswob.print_time AS work_print_time,-- 厂内码打印时间 mswobsale.print_time AS sale_print_time,-- 销售码打印时间 mfbpr.in_process_time AS carton_scan_time,-- 打包扫描时间 mfbprpallet.in_process_time AS pallet_scan_time,-- 入库下线扫描时间 wiid.receiving_date,-- 堆垛入库时间 wiid.deliver_date,-- 拣货出库时间 wiidout.modified_time AS car_scan_time,-- 装车扫描时间 CASE WHEN IFNULL(wiidout.barcode_status,'')=6 THEN '完成' ELSE '未完成' END AS barcode_status-- 条码状态 FROM mes_pm_work_order mpwo LEFT JOIN om_sales_order oso ON mpwo.sales_order_id=oso.sales_order_id LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON mpwo.material_id=bm.material_id LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_work_order_barcode mswob ON mpwo.work_order_id=mswob.work_order_id AND label_category_id=56 LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_key_part_relevance makpr ON mswob.barcode=makpr.barcode_code LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_work_order_barcode mswobsale ON makpr.part_barcode=mswobsale.barcode LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_barcode_process_record mfbpr ON mswob.barcode=mfbpr.barcode AND IFNULL(mfbpr.carton_code,'') !='' AND IFNULL(mfbpr.pallet_code,'')='' LEFT JOIN mes_sfc_barcode_process_record mfbprpallet ON mswob.barcode=mfbprpallet.barcode AND IFNULL(mfbprpallet.pallet_code,'') !='' LEFT JOIN wms_inner_inventory_det wiid ON mswob.barcode=wiid.barcode LEFT JOIN wms_inner_inventory_det wiidout ON mswob.barcode=wiidout.barcode AND wiidout.barcode_status=6
and wii.org_id=#{orgId}
